text: Red Necktie () is a 1948 Soviet drama movie directed by Mariya Sauts and Vladimir Sukhobokov.Гостья из будущего, или Посторонним вход воспрещенКрасный галстук It stars Aleksandr Khvylya, Galina Stepanova, and Vera Okuneva. == Actors == * Aleksandr Khvylya as Vishnyakov (as A.Khvylya) * Galina Stepanova as Nadezhda Ivanovna (as G. Stepanova) * Vera Okuneva as Grandmother (as V. Okuneva) * Vitali Doronin as Kochubei (as V. Doronin) * Nikolay Bogatyryov as Young Pioneer organizer (as N. Bogatyryov) == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Soviet movies Category:1948 movies Category:Soviet drama movies
title: Red Necktie
